name: Scholar
ability: You start knowing which Minions & Demon are in play.
firstNightReminder: Show the Scholar the in-play Minions and Demon.

The Demon chooses a player tonight, unlike normal: mark that player with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder. Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
otherNightReminder: Do not kill the player the Demon chooses; instead, mark them with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder.  Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
name: Fencer
ability: The Demon attacks on the 1st night, but its’ victims die 1 night later. Each night, you learn who the Demon chose.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Al-Hadikhia's choices are announced 1 night later.

name: Biologist
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: learn 1 of their characters. If either are drunk or poisoned, learn false info.

otherNightReminder: Count the number of "Voted" reminders placed. Show the Spice Trader that number. If you would show them 0, the Spice Trader becomes drunk.
name: Spice Trader
ability: Each night*, learn how many evil players voted today. If you would learn a 0, you become drunk.

jinxes.reason: f players eyes were closed during nominations, the Spice Trader learns which player received the most evil votes & how many they received.
Players who nominate & kill someone register as voting to the Spice Trader.

name: Physicist
ability: Once per game, at night*, learn how many Minions live & an alive Minion character if 1 lives.

name: Grandmaster
ability: Once per game, visit the Storyteller to privately learn who your most important ally is, but not why they're important.

name: Psychologist
ability: 1 evil player thinks they're good & doesn't partake in evil info. If you die, they learn the truth & their team.
firstNightReminder: The *Illusioned* evil player thinks they're good & doesn't partake in evil info.
otherNightReminder: If the Psychologist died today, the *Illusioned* player learns the truth & their team.

name: Chemist
ability: You have a fusion of 2 in-play characters' abilities. Each day. privately guess which characters: if right, learn your ability.
firstNightReminder: Mark 2 players with the *Synthesised* reminders and then decide on the Chemist's ability based on which characters are marked. If appropriate, run the ability tonight.

name: Occultist
ability: You might be executed unless you are mad about learning something new every day. Once per game, when you visit the Storyteller, you learn a fact.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Sleepwalker, and act as though they had the ability they think they do: secretly run the ability they actually have. Wake 1 Good player, and show them the Sleepwalker token.
name: Sleepwalker
ability: You think you’re a Townsfolk, but you have a different ability with the same choices. 1 good player knows you’re in play.

firstNightReminder: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
otherNightReminder: If the poisoned player died today or tonight: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
name: Manipulator
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player: you learn & have their ability & they are poisoned. If they die, choose again.

jinxes.reason: If the Manipulator dies while poisoning the Damsel, the Damsel remains poisoned.

firstNightReminder: The Malpractitioner chooses 3 (-1)/1 (+1) player: 1 is poisoned. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Malpractitioner chooses 3 (-1)/1 (+1) player: 1 is poisoned. :reminder:
name: Malpractitioner
ability: Each night, choose 3 players: 1 is poisoned. If you added an Outsider, choose 1 instead. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Show the Cryptid part of their ability. Show the good player marked as "Knows" the other part of the ability. If appropriate, run the custom ability.
otherNightReminder: Run the custom ability of the Cryptid.
name: Cryptid
ability: You only know part of your ability. 1 good player knows the rest of it.

otherNightReminder: If a player was executed yesterday, the Graverobber learns their character & gains that player's ability.
name: Graverobber
ability: You learn the character & gain the ability of executees.

name: Doomsday Clock
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If no Minions live, good learns it is Midnight & must kill you today or lose. Good Minions don't partake in evil info. [+1 good Minion]
otherNightReminder: The Doomsday Clock chooses a player: they die. :reminder: If no Minions live, mark the Doomsday Clock with *Midnight*. :reminder: Tomorrow, all players learn this & will have 1 day to execute the Doomsday Clock.

jinxes.reason: If a good Minion makes a Damsel guess, it won't count.

name: Bio-Weapon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Evils & poisoned players who nominate poison good nominees. If all alive good players are poisoned, good learns it is Midnight & must kill you today or lose.
otherNightReminder: The Bio-Weapon chooses a player: they die. :reminder: If all alive players except the Bio-Weapon are poisoned, mark the Bio-Weapon with *Midnight*. :reminder: Tomorrow, all players learn this & will have 1 day to execute the Bio-Weapon.
